            <label for="4659e7da">是否使用 sudo</label>

{% raw %}
<div class="z-help"><h1>LLVM APT 软件仓库</h1>
<h3>安装脚本</h3>
<div class="z-wrap"><form class="z-form" onchange="form_update(event)" onsubmit="return false"><div><label for="35934fcb" title>LLVM 版本</label><select id="35934fcb" name="ver" title><option value="">默认</option><option value="15">15</option><option value="14">14</option><option value="13">13</option><option value="12">12</option><option value="11">11</option></select></div></form><pre class="z-code"></pre></div><tmpl z-input="ver" z-lang="bash">
# 下载脚本
wget {{endpoint}}/llvm.sh
chmod +x llvm.sh
{{sudo}}./llvm.sh{{#ver}} {{ver}}{{/ver}} all -m {{endpoint}}
</tmpl>
<h3>手动启用</h3>
<p>首先信任来自 https://apt.llvm.org/ 的 PGP 公钥：</p>
<div class="z-wrap"><form class="z-form" onchange="form_update(event)" onsubmit="return false"></form><pre class="z-code"></pre></div><tmpl z-lang="bash">
wget -O - https://apt.llvm.org/llvm-snapshot.gpg.key | {{sudo}}apt-key add -
</tmpl>
<p>新增 <code>/etc/apt/sources.list.d/llvm-apt.list</code>，内容为</p>
<div class="z-wrap"><form class="z-form" onchange="form_update(event)" onsubmit="return false"><div><label for="b607ef9b" title>发行版</label><select id="b607ef9b" name="release" title><option value="bullseye">Debian 11 (bullseye)</option><option value="buster">Debian 10 (buster)</option><option value="jammy">Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy)</option><option value="focal">Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal)</option><option value="bionic">Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic)</option></select></div><div><label for="6814d77d" title>LLVM 版本</label><select id="6814d77d" name="ver2" title><option value="">默认</option><option value="16">16</option><option value="15">15</option><option value="14">14</option><option value="13">13</option><option value="12">12</option><option value="11">11</option></select></div><div><input id="9dc9b7da" name="src" title="源码源通常用于构建和调试，开启后影响更新速度" type="checkbox"/><label for="9dc9b7da" title="源码源通常用于构建和调试，开启后影响更新速度">启用源码源</label></div></form><pre class="z-code"></pre></div><tmpl z-input="release ver2 src" z-path="/etc/apt/sources.list.d/llvm-apt.list">
# 默认注释了源码镜像以提高 apt update 速度，如有需要可自行取消注释
deb {{endpoint}}/{{release}}/ llvm-toolchain-{{release}}{{#ver2}}-{{ver2}}{{/ver2}} main
{{src}}deb-src {{endpoint}}/{{release}}/ llvm-toolchain-{{release}}{{#ver2}}-{{ver2}}{{/ver2}} main
</tmpl><script id="z-config" type="application/x-mirrorz-help"></script>
</div>

{% endraw %}
